text:
Company: Parks Ltd  
Role: Human Resources Support Staff  

Company Background:  
Parks Ltd is an industry leader in providing top-notch park management services. We pride ourselves on creating enriching and safe environments for communities to enjoy the outdoors. 

Job Type: Full-time  

Job Description:  
Parks Ltd is seeking a dedicated Human Resources Support Staff member to join our team. She will play a pivotal role in cultivating a supportive workplace, contributing to the overall well-being of our employees. Her calm and patient demeanour will be highly valued as she helps nurture and develop our workforce.

Responsibilities:  
- Provide administrative support to the HR department.
- Assist with the recruitment process, including posting job ads and scheduling interviews.
- She will manage employee records and maintain accurate documentation.
- Address employee inquiries and provide support as needed.
- Assist in the coordination of training and development programs.
- She should have a nurturing approach to problem-solving and be able to collaborate effectively with the team.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
- Experience in HR administration or support roles.
- Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
- Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Her background in managing employee relations will be a plus.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office and HR software.

Perks and Benefits:  
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $40,000 to $55,000 based on your experience and skills.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and holidays.
- Professional development opportunities.
- A supportive and inclusive workplace environment.

Parks Ltd is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.
